Address.label: Address
Address.value: 60 CUTTER MILL ROAD,SUITE 303, GREAT NECK, New York, 11021, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BRT Apartments Corp is a real estate investment trust company. The company is primarily focused on the ownership, operation, and development of multi-family properties. BRT also owns and operates other real estate assets. All of the Company's assets are comprised of multi-family real estate assets generally leased to tenants on a one-year basis.
